pages.title: Zoom and Enhance
pages.text: The $(l:quests/chap3/09constellation)Constellation Papers$() you found in those old shrines detail the position and shape of the $(thing)Constellations$() in the sky. Perhaps it's time to try and identify them. A simple $(item)Looking Glass$() will suffice, but a stationary $(item)Telescope$() has a bit more pizazz don't you think?

pages.heading: Looking Glass
pages.description: Hold Shift to release the cursor and draw the $(thing)Constellations$().

pages.heading: Looking Glass
pages.description: Different $(thing)Constellations$() appear on different phases of the moon, so check each night.
